R

bit order is wrong: MSB first is correct

Logs atteurnation set with program https://github.com/novi/nextstep_experiment/tree/master/soundvolume

00 packet is no change

S,L,R: Stereo,Left,Right,* is changed value
0,0,0:        00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 80 00
*-2,-2,-2:    00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 00 80 00
*-4,-4,-4:    00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 00 20 00 80 00
*-6,-6,-6:    00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 40 60 00 80 00
*-8,-8,-8:    00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 80 00
*-14,-14,-14: 00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 80 00
*-30,-30,-30: 00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 00 20 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 80 00
*-42,-42,-42: 00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 80 00
*-86,-86,-86: 00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 40 60 40 60 00 80 00

-1,*-2,0:     00 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 00 80 00
-2,*-4,0:     00 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 00 20 00 80 00
-7,*-14,0:    00 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 80 00
-21,*-42,0:   00 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 80 00

-1,0,*-2:     00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 00 80 00
-43,0,*-86:   00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 40 60 40 60 00 80 00

-36,-42,*-30: 00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 80 00
-25,-42,*-8:  00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 00 20 00 20 00 80 00
-34,*-60,-8:  00 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 00 80 00

Lch=val,Rch=0 00 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 40 60 XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX 00 80 00
Lch=0,Rch=val 00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 00 20 XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX xx xx 00 80 00
L,R=val       00 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 40 60 XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX 00 80 00

all           00 40 60 40 60 40 60 XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX XX 00 80 00

              00 40 60 40 60 40 60 C1 C1 C0 C0 X5 X5 X4 X4 X3 X3 X2 X2 X1 X1 X0 X0 00 80 00

CC=Command
00 20 40 60 -> 00011011 0x1B = 01 Lch set
40 60 00 20 -> 10110001 0xB1 = 10 Rch set
40 60 40 60 -> 10111011 0xBB = 11 Both ch set

Data XX
0:      00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 -> 000100010001000100010001 =    111 = 000 = 0
-2:     00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 -> 000100010001000100011011 =    11B = 001 = 1
-4:     00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 00 20 -> 000100010001000110110001 =    1B1 = 010 = 2
-6:     00 20 00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 40 60 -> 000100010001000110111011 =    1BB = 011 = 3
-8:     00 20 00 20 00 20 40 60 00 20 00 20 -> 000100010001101100010001 =    B11 = 100 = 4
-10: (B1B) = 101
-12: (BB1) = 110
-14: (BBB) = 111
-86:    40 60 00 20 40 60 00 20 40 60 40 60 -> 101100011011000110111011 = B1B1BB = 101011 = 43


40 60 = 1
00 20 = 0


00 40 60 40 60 40 60 C1 C1 C0 C0 X5 X5 X4 X4 X3 X3 X2 X2 X1 X1 X0 X0 00 80 00
00 [111CCXXXXXX] 00 80 00

bit order is wrong: MSB first is correct, fixed

00 02 06 02 06 02 06 C1 C1 C0 C0 X5 X5 X4 X4 X3 X3 X2 X2 X1 X1 X0 X0 00 01 00

02 06 = 1 = 0000 0010 0000 0110
00 04 = 0 = 0000 0000 0000 0100

00 [111CCXXXXXX] 00 01 00
